title: Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations in an Ontology Subsection or Single Profile

fields.label: General Placement
General Title of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of a fake subpage (or section) for locations in area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Intro Text of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of a fake subpage (or section) for locations in area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Featured Image of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_featured_image_general
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.
